Generation IV.Diamond: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
Generation IV.Pearl: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
Generation IV.Platinum: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

Generation VI.X: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
Generation VI.Y: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

Generation VII.Sun: It appears as if from nowhere—muttering incantations, placing curses, and giving people terrifying visions.
Generation VII.Moon: Mismagius have been known to cast spells to make people fall in love, so some people search for this Pokémon as if their life depended on it.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokémon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its muttered curses can cause awful headaches or terrifying visions that torment others.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Its cries sound like incantations. Those who hear it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It chants incantations. While these incantations can torment targets, some bring happiness.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: The incantations Mismagius chants can ward against misfortune, so a custom exists of inviting it into one's home. Incur the Pokémon's displeasure, however, and disaster will surely ensue.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
Generation IX.Violet: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
